text:
Lol. May we also capture & vaccinate birds, squirrels & other wildlife whilst we're at it? 

'Nobody's safe until everyone is safe.'

BBC news can be comical yet this is not an April fools joke. 

#BBC #bbcnews #jab #vaccine #safety #AprilFools #DefundTheBBC #COVID #COVID19 #UK https://t.co/iTUTPJiQwP
